books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: The TV journalist Kerra Bailey and former federal agent John Trapper join forces to expose a web of conspiracy behind a hotel bombing in Dallas.
books.name: SEEING RED

books.author: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: Two New York writers go undercover to expose the secrets of a powerful retailer.
books.name: THE STORE

books.author: by Tess Gerritsen
books.description: Rizzoli and Isles investigate two separate homicides and uncover other dangerous mysteries.
books.name: I KNOW A SECRET

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Renée Ballard, a young detective with the L.A.P.D., investigates crimes against two women.
books.name: THE LATE SHOW

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: Bennie Rosato and Mary DiNunzio find themselves on opposite sides of a lawsuit, threatening their friendship and their law firm.
books.name: EXPOSED

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer, researching her grandmother’s past, learns about a Tennessee orphanage that kidnapped children and placed them for adoption with wealthy people. Based on a real-life scandal.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by N. K. Jemisin
books.description: The final book of the trilogy that includes the Hugo Award-winning titles "The Fifth Season" and "The Obelisk Gate."
books.name: THE STONE SKY

books.author: by Gabrielle Zevin
books.description: A down-on-his-luck bookseller gets a second chance when a small, mysterious package arrives at his store.
books.name: THE STORIED LIFE OF A. J. FIKRY

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth has grown increasingly grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Basis of the HBO series.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: Men and women in a dystopian future. The basis of the Hulu series; originally published in 1985.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE
